original_title: Sri Lanka shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s shares edged up in mid day trade on Tuesday, Colombo Stock Exchange (CSE).
The main All Share Price Index (ASPI) was up 0.14 percent or 14.52 points to 10,742.51, while the most liquid index S&P SL20 was down 0.40 percent or 12.75 points to 3,144.17
Top gainers during mid day trade were Ceylinco Insurance, DFCC Bank & Commercial Bank. (Colombo/July18/2023)
